question: As long as I have had Type II Diabetes, (10 years now) I have never felt well when my sugars were well controlled. Except when i'm actually eating, I feel sick, fatiqued and often have unsettlingly jumpy heart beat. I actually ended up in the emergency room last December because my heartbeat was racing. My blood sugar was 90. Unless my sugars are ridiculoulsy high, I feel good. I've never felt "Good" when my sugars are.
title: sick when in target range
